name: Tiny Striker La Liga 2018
description:
Enjoy the latest football with all of the players and superstars of LaLiga. Become the ultimate Striker in Tiny Striker LaLiga 2018.

Now you just need to choose your favourite team, get out on the field, show off your skills, and win tournaments!

Compete against all LaLiga teams in the 2018/19 season:

Join your Tiny Striker as they go pro, playing against over 42 LaLiga teams across 3 leagues including LaLiga 1|2|3 and LaLiga Santander

Train and craft your Striker:

It is your job to train and craft your Striker to give yourself the edge against other LaLiga teams to become the ultimate champion

Customise your Striker and share match highlights:

Change the appearance of your Striker, collect boots that enhance your abilities and share your match highlights with others

Do you think you've got what it takes to be a CHAMPION?


Download Tiny Striker La Liga now!

More information at:

www.laliga.es
https://www.facebook.com/LaLiga
www.twitter.com/laliga
www.instagram.com/laliga
publishers: La Liga Nacional de Futbol Profesional
